jy1e7lxs8c4wpfhlo5usaif6rbi5dhx3p8ooh13w.content:
Hello %%LoyaltyProgramMember:Contact:FirstName%% 

You are noThis test email is sent from Loyalty Management team.
Please check the below details.
%%[
var @LoyaltyMemberTierRow, @memberId, @LoyaltyMemberTier, @LoyaltyTierId, @Name,@LoyaltyTierGroupId, @CurrencyName, @PointsBalance, @EscrowPointsBalance, @LoyaltyProgramCurrencyId, @LoyaltyMemberCurrency,@LoyaltyMemberCurrencyRow, @LoyaltyProgramCurrencyName, @LoyaltyProgramCurrencyNameRow, @ProgramCurrencyName set @memberId = LoyaltyProgramMember:Id

set @LoyaltyMemberTier = RetrieveSalesforceObjects("LoyaltyMemberTier" , "LoyaltyTierId, LoyaltyTierGroupId, Name", "LoyaltyMemberId", "=", @memberId)

If RowCount(@LoyaltyMemberTier) > 0 then
Set @LoyaltyMemberTierRow = Row(@LoyaltyMemberTier, 1)
Set @LoyaltyTierId = FIELD(@LoyaltyMemberTierRow, "LoyaltyTierId")
Set @Name = FIELD(@LoyaltyMemberTierRow, "Name")
Set @LoyaltyTierGroupId = FIELD(@LoyaltyMemberTierRow, "LoyaltyTierGroupId")
endif

var @TierGroupName, @LoyaltyTierGroup, @TierRow set @LoyaltyTierGroup = RetrieveSalesforceObjects("LoyaltyTierGroup" , "Name", "Id", "=", @LoyaltyTierGroupId)
If RowCount(@LoyaltyTierGroup) > 0 then
Set @TierRow = Row(@LoyaltyTierGroup, 1)
Set @TierGroupName = FIELD(@TierRow, "Name")
endif
]%%
Your Tier group name is %%=v(@TierGroupName)=%%
Tier name is %%=v(@Name)=%%

oqrvt74901l.content:
%%[ set @LoyaltyMemberCurrency = RetrieveSalesforceObjects("LoyaltyMemberCurrency" , "LoyaltyProgramCurrencyId, Name, PointsBalance", "LoyaltyMemberId", "=", @memberId) If RowCount(@LoyaltyMemberCurrency) > 0 then for @i=1 to RowCount(@LoyaltyMemberCurrency) do Set @LoyaltyMemberCurrencyRow = Row(@LoyaltyMemberCurrency, @i) Set @CurrencyName = FIELD(@LoyaltyMemberCurrencyRow, "Name") Set @PointsBalance = FIELD(@LoyaltyMemberCurrencyRow, "PointsBalance") Set @LoyaltyProgramCurrencyId = FIELD(@LoyaltyMemberCurrencyRow, "LoyaltyProgramCurrencyId") set @LoyaltyProgramCurrencyName = RetrieveSalesforceObjects("LoyaltyProgramCurrency" , "Name", "Id", "=", @LoyaltyProgramCurrencyId) If RowCount(@LoyaltyProgramCurrencyName) > 0 then Set @LoyaltyProgramCurrencyNameRow = Row(@LoyaltyProgramCurrencyName, 1) Set @ProgramCurrencyName = FIELD(@LoyaltyProgramCurrencyNameRow, "Name") endif ]%% %%[ next @i endif ]%%
Name Loyalty Program Currency Points Balance
%%=v(@CurrencyName)=%% %%=v(@ProgramCurrencyName)=%% %%=v(@PointsBalance)=%%
